doc.field: F Y f1874reute r f BC-TENNECO-TGT>-UNIT-ST 06-02 0045
TENNECO TGT> UNIT STARTS SERVING PPG PPG>

Tenneco Inc said its Tenngasco Corp subsidiary has started delivering up to 40 mln cubic feet per day of natural gas to PPG Industries Inc in Lake Charles, Louisiana, under a 10-year firm supply contract. Reuter
